content.title: About Me
content.caption: A fresh graduate from Surabaya - Indonesia, who has have learned and developed skills in backend development, including programming languages and database management. I also have a strong interest in how to understand system needs, analyse requirements, and collaborate with teams to develop effective solutions. At the same time, I am interested in learning and implementing cloud solutions to improve application scalability and performance.

content.title: Cloud Database Research Study Case of ITS FRS Service for Undergraduate Thesis

info.title: Details
caption: Research about scalability of data-intensive apps like FRS ITS web app with a focus on improving scalability when accessed by many concurrent users by migrating to a cloud database.
Identifying problems that occur related to scalability in the FRS ITS service when accessed by many users.
Designing solutions using several databases such as CloudSQL, AlloyDB, Firestore, and Redis, and implementing other solutions such as queues with pub sub and message queues in the GCP ecosystem.
Reengineering web applications with JavaScript programming language and Express.js framework to align cloud solutions.
Create specifications for the reengineered web application, including data model design and technical architecture based on ICONIX Process.
Performed web application deployment process and created unit tests then performance tests with load tests using 22,000 users.
Analyzed result of load test and calculate cost used by solutions so that the best and most cost-effective solution is determined.

info.title: Project Details
caption: A website based on polyglot persistence for the Final Project of the Database Technology course.
Social media-like website to share the desktop setup with other users.
Involved as a Back-end Developer by creating RESTful API endpoints to be used on the Front End later.
Backend Tech Stack: NodeJs, Express JS, Database : (Mongo db, Redis, Neo4j, PostgreSQL), Auth : JWT, Cloud Media : Cloudinary

info.title: Project Details
caption: A web app that was worked on during the internship period at PT ADMA Digital Solusi that helps break down the user's dream target into more detail and measurable.

Involved as a Web Developer, focusing on data modelling and integration with designs that have been coded, then creating function logic for dynamic displays and API calls from other application endpoints.
Override default authentication proccess with WA otp
Tech Stack: Laravel

info.title: Project Details
caption: A website developed for the final project of the independent Full stack developer study at binar academy, which is an e-commerce website for selling and buying secondhanded / preloved goods.
Involved as a Backend developer by creating RESTful API endpoints to be used in the Front End later. Then helping with data integration with Redux state management on the front end.
Back End Tech Stack : Node Js, Express Js, Database: PostgreSql , Auth : JWT, Cloud Media : Cloudinary
Front End Tech Stack : React Js, Redux

info.title: Project Details
caption: A digital business project for the final project of the Digital Business course which is a website in the form of Discovery e-commerce with the theme of Indonesian specialties, which aims to create a new experience in finding and buying food gifts.
Involved as a web developer by designing and building a database system using MySQL for web applications and then validating it with user tests.
This project was chosen as a community service project for the Enterprise Systems lab at the Department of Information Systems ITS
Tech Stack: Laravel
